title: Implementing a Simple Multisig Contract
creator: 0xD6823f807C45eFDC56c9aE8Db0226CA10af6E8AB

questions.title:
Implementing a simple multi-signature contract wallet, the contract includes the following functions:
1. When creating a multi-signature wallet, determine all multi-signature holders and the signature threshold.
2. Multi-signature holders can submit proposals.
3. Other multi-signature holders confirm the proposal (confirmation can be done using transaction).
4. When the multi-signature threshold is reached, anyone can execute the transaction.

Submit the code or github link.

description: Understand the contract wallet and the implementation of multi-signature through challenges, and comprehend the underlying Call invocation.
